After Double-Blind Phase , study medication taper Taper Phase , whose duration vary depend patient . The evaluation include electrophysiological assessment , quantitative sensory assessment , clinical assessment subjective pain scale . Safety evaluation ( vital sign , clinical laboratory evaluation , physical neurological examination , evaluation adverse event ) conduct trial .
